name: conversations (inktober prompt: "coat")
description:
Content warning: sexuality! enough that it would bother my mom, but probably not bother most people my age I know. The Road to El Dorado was waaaaay more NSFW than this.

Behind-the-scenes notes: [I highly recommend NOT reading this section until AFTER you've played through the game once]

Are you sure?

Okay...

My thinking around the "coat" prompt had already made me think of this particular narrative to write, based partially on an amalgamation of similar experiences I've had in my life, BUT I ended up finding it much easier to write the anonymous characters if I  made it a low-key fanfic. 

In a certain context, this is about the one time that I played Persona 5, and completely accidentally got in a relationship with Ann after I (i.e. player-protagonist/Joker) had already gotten together with Makoto. If you've played Persona 5 or are otherwise very familiar with the game, the references were probably super obvious to you.
